Posts.Content: I am with you......same 6 chemo/rads and they want me to pass on tamoxifen and go on to aromasin...less sides effects. But who are we to believe? Doctors have over 10 years of research on Tamoxifen and yes there are sides effects....but aromasin is new....but I haven't seen much on research that I can get my hands on. It is such a tuff decision to make......5 years on this stuff! Tamoxifin or aromasin? Which is better?
Posts.Title: 1st day of Tamoxifen....what to expect...5 yrs!!!

Posts.Content: I have stage 2 breast cancer with 3 lymph nodes effected. I made it through chemo and radation....now my oncologist wants to put me on Aromasin. Anyone going through this too? I hear the side effects of Aromasin are bad. Is it worth it? I am thinking about not taking it. Help!
Posts.Title: Aromasin after Chemo and Radiation
